metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8124 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Insufficient validation and sanitization of user input exists in url-parsenpm package version 1.4.4 and earlier may allow attacker to bypass securitychecks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8124` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-url-parse - 1.2.0-1ubuntu0.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: node-url-parse package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.0-1ubuntu0.1').
